name: bim_api_regression_tests
description: Automated test runner for the Osram BIM API

scripts.config_nodes: newman run sanityConfigNodes.json -e sanityConfigNodes_env.json -g globalVariables.json --insecure --global-var env=dev
scripts.config_relations: newman run sanityConfigRelations.json -e sanityConfigRelations_env.json -g globalVariables.json --insecure --global-var env=dev
scripts.cascade_delete: newman run regressionCascadeDelete.json -e regressionCascadeDelete_env.json -g globalVariables.json --insecure --global-var env=dev
scripts.dag: newman run regressionDAG.json -e regressionDAG_env.json -g globalVariables.json --insecure --global-var env=dev

author: Osram Encelium
